languages.text: "Кассия Тисифия Эвриаэлла, Леди-Навигатор Дома Орселлио". {n}Все — от снисходительного взгляда и уверенной осанки до негромкого, но властного голоса — выдает в Кассии наследницу великой династии. Зачарованный, секретарь выводит каждую букву ее имени с особым усердием.{/n}

"Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кассия Тисифия Эвриаэлла, Леди-Навигатор Дома Орселлио". {n}Все — от снисходительного взгляда и уверенной осанки до негромкого, но властного голоса — выдает в Кассии наследницу великой династии. Зачарованный, секретарь выводит каждую букву ее имени с особым усердием.{/n}

Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

languages.text: 「カシア・ティシフィア・エヴリエラ、オーセリオ家の航宙士よ」{n}彼女の軽蔑的な視線、自信に満ちた態度、冷静で命令的な声まで、すべてがカシアを偉大な家系の継承者であることを示している。畏怖の念に打たれた秘書は、彼女の名前を一文字一文字、細心の注意で書き留めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カシア・ティシフィア・エヴリエラ、オーセリオ家の航宙士よ」{n}彼女の軽蔑的な視線、自信に満ちた態度、冷静で命令的な声まで、すべてがカシアを偉大な家系の継承者であることを示している。畏怖の念に打たれた秘書は、彼女の名前を一文字一文字、細心の注意で書き留めた。{/n}

languages.text: « Dame Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Dame navigatrice de la maison Orsellio. » {n}Avec son regard condescendant, sa posture distinguée et son ton calme qui ne laisse cependant place à aucune contestation, il ne fait aucun doute que Cassia est l'héritière d'une lignée d'exception. Abasourdi, le secrétaire consigne chaque lettre de son nom avec une minutie inutile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dame Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Dame navigatrice de la maison Orsellio. » {n}Avec son regard condescendant, sa posture distinguée et son ton calme qui ne laisse cependant place à aucune contestation, il ne fait aucun doute que Cassia est l'héritière d'une lignée d'exception. Abasourdi, le secrétaire consigne chaque lettre de son nom avec une minutie inutile.{/n}

languages.text: “卡西娅·提西菲亚·埃弗里亚拉，奥赛罗家族的导航者女士。”{n}无论是卡西娅居高临下的目光，充满自信的举止，还是她平静但充满命令意味的声音，都表明她是伟大家族的继承人。秘书以敬畏的目光看着她，飞快地记下了她名字中的每个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅·提西菲亚·埃弗里亚拉，奥塞罗家族的导航者女士。”{n}无论是卡西娅居高临下的目光，充满自信的举止，还是她平静但充满命令意味的声音，都表明她是伟大家族的继承人。秘书以敬畏的目光看着她，飞快地记下了她名字中的每个字。{/n}

languages.text: «Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, lady Navegante de la casa Orsellio». {n}Todo lo que la rodea, desde su mirada condescendiente y su porte seguro hasta su voz tranquila pero dominante, indica que Cassia es la heredera de una estirpe de renombre. La secretaria, asombrada, escribe cada letra de su nombre con especial meticulosidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, lady Navegante de la casa Orsellio». {n}Todo lo que la rodea, desde su mirada condescendiente y su porte seguro hasta su voz tranquila pero dominante, indica que Cassia es la heredera de una estirpe de renombre. La secretaria, asombrada, escribe cada letra de su nombre con especial meticulosidad.{/n}

languages.text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator des Hauses Orsellio." {n}Alles an Cassia macht augenblicklich klar, dass Cassia die Erbin einer noblen Familie ist, von ihrem herablassenden Blick und ihrer selbstbewussten Haltung bis hin zu ihrer ruhigen, aber gebieterischen Stimme. Ehrfürchtig schreibt der Sekretär jeden Buchstaben ihres Namens besonders penibel nieder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator des Hauses Orsellio." {n}Alles an Cassia macht augenblicklich klar, dass Cassia die Erbin einer noblen Familie ist, von ihrem herablassenden Blick und ihrer selbstbewussten Haltung bis hin zu ihrer ruhigen, aber gebieterischen Stimme. Ehrfürchtig schreibt der Sekretär jeden Buchstaben ihres Namens besonders penibel nieder.{/n}

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nden Leydi Rotacı Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella." {n}Cassia'nın küçümseyen bakışları ile kendinden emin tavrından sakin ama buyurgan sesine kadar her şey, büyük bir soyun vârisi olduğunu işaret ediyor. Apışıp kalan yazman, adının her harfini titizlikle yazıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Cassia Tisiphia Evriaella, Lady Navigator of House Orsellio." {n}Everything from her condescending gaze and confident bearing to her calm but commanding voice marks Cassia as the heiress of a great bloodline. Awestruck, the secretary writes down each letter of her name with particular fastidiousness.{/n}
